thread.section_title: Pregnant Cheryl Cole News, Pictures, Style and Baby Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: Kimberley Walsh and Sarah Harding post tributes to Cheryl
thread.title_full: Kimberley Walsh and Sarah Harding post tributes to Cheryl | Daily Mail Online

author: Marc Jackson for MailOnline
title: Kimberley Walsh and Sarah Harding post tributes to Cheryl
text:
She has refused to talk about or even confirm her pregnancy.
But Cheryl 's fans have been left speculating whether she has something special to celebrate after he pals posted gushing tributes to the expectant mum on social media.
The singer's former Girls Aloud bandmates Kimberley Walsh and Sarah Harding have both shared sweet snaps of the star in recent days for no apparent reason.
Scroll down for video
Reaching out: Cheryl's fans have been left speculating whether she has something special to celebrate after he pals posted gushing tributes to the expectant mum on social media
Cheryl's BFF Kimberley - who recently welcomed her second child Cole Quote: : 'Love this pic of me and Cheryl,' while Sarah captioned her montage: '#kissestothemissus #good #times.'
Followers have suggested they are trying to publicly trying to congratulate Cheryl, without giving the game away.
Meanwhile, Cheryl and her baby daddy Liam Payne have kept silent on social media, with the former X Factor judge steering clear of Instagram for six weeks.
The posts come after Liam jetted back from working on his new album in Los Angeles ahead of the birth of his first child, sending gossips into overdrive.
Keeping their Twitter and Instagram profiles in a state of lock-down, both Liam, 23, and Cheryl, 33, have not deigned to address the rumours.
Celebration? The singer's former Girls Aloud bandmates Kimberley Walsh and Sarah Harding have both shared sweet snaps of the star in recent days for no apparent reason
Silence: Instead of dismissing the speculation surrounding their pregnancy, both Cheryl and Liam Payne have kept their silence on social media - with the Fight For This Love hitmaker snubbing Instagram for six weeks
Steal Cheryl's style in an Alexander Wang khaki dress £530 Alexander Wang Perforated Stripe Crew Neck Dress
Now reduced to £196 at Goodhood London
Buy now
Cheryl's been taking maternity dressing in her stride, sticking to her savvy sartorial ways throughout her pregnancy.
Just before Christmas she stepped out in a look put together for her by Anna Hughes-Chamberlain. Sporting a khaki ribbed bodycon dress by Alexander Wang teamed with a check panel Fendi coat, she accessorised her look with an embellished clutch and over-the-knee boots by Alexander McQueen.
We're loving this look on Cheryl! You can't beat a bit of khaki in your wardrobe and we love this funky twist on a traditional jumper dress thanks to the edgy cut-out detail.
Click right to get this must-have dress from Goodhood London, or recreate Cheryl’s look with one of the khaki ribbed dresses from our edit below, including picks from Bohooo, Miss Pap, Missguided and ASOS.

Hiding something? The couple's black out on social media comes not long after the One Direction star's return from his recording session state-side sent fans into gossip over-drive
One fan even made links between her absence from social media and the birth of her child, writing:
'Cheryl has been gone from social media for over a month. I'm pretty sure that means she's gonna have this baby soon,' wrote one.
Earlier this week Liam put an end to his artistic exodus in California, where he has been recording his debut solo effort, to fly back to be at Cheryl's side.
After laying down tracks with a team of writers and producers, Liam returned to his London home, where former Girls Aloud singer Cheryl was waiting - prompting many eager fans convinced that she is on the verge of giving birth.
Indeed, the timing of his return has led to inevitably fervent speculation that she is already in labour, with many fans airing their thoughts on Twitter.
Taking to the micro-blogging site, one mused: 'Hold up, Cheryl is having the baby NOW?'
Hold up! The timing of his return earlier this week has led to fervent speculation that she is already in labour, with many fans airing their thoughts on Twitter
Bold: Offering a confident prediction, another raved 'Cheryl's super baby is coming.'
Busy boy: The One Direction star has been working on his debut solo album in Los Angeles over recent weeks as he continues to justify his multi-million record deal with Capitol
Working it out:Elsewhere fans were quick to make a connection with the singer's lengthy absence from Twitter and Instagram
Bemused: Another appeared confused by the fervent speculation, writing 'Wait is Cheryl in labor? Why do I keep seeing things about her baby?'
Offering a confident prediction, another raved: 'Cheryl's super baby is coming.'
Another appeared confused by the fervent speculation, writing: 'Wait is Cheryl in labor? Why do I keep seeing things about her baby?'
One excited follower announced: ‘If you guys wanna meet LIAM PAYNE IN LONDON, he is on AMERICAN AIRLINES 108! It lands at 11am London time!’
Another, evidently keen to give fans an opportunity to catch sight of the star first Quote: : ‘If you wanna catch Liam Payne at Heathrow he is ok American Airlines 108! Terminal 3, leaving LAX in 40 minutes! Go go go.’
Elsewhere a fan account dedicated to Liam and Cheryl triumphantly chirped: 'Liam has returned to London!'
Useful tip: One excited follower announced ‘If you guys wanna meet LIAM PAYNE IN LONDON, he is on AMERICAN AIRLINES 108! It lands at 11am London time!’
He's on his way: Another, evidently keen to give fans an opportunity to catch sight of the star first hand, wrote ‘If you wanna catch Liam Payne at Heathrow he is ok American Airlines 108! Terminal 3, leaving LAX in 40 minutes! Go go go’
Delighted: Eager fans were quick to document his return to the UK across social media
Obvious: While she's yet to publicly confirm that she's expecting her first child with Liam, Cheryl's bulging baby bump has all but announced the news
While she's yet to publicly confirm that she's expecting her first child with Liam, Cheryl's bulging baby bump has all but announced the news.
And the 33-year-old pop star may have disrobed for a special baby bump shoot - reminiscent of Demi Moore's famous 1991 Vanity Fair cover, taken while she was seven months pregnant with daughter Scout LaRue.
On Friday morning, fashion photographer Mariano Vivanco took to Instagram to share a behind-the-scenes shot of crumpled red sheet atop a wooden stool, longside the caption 'My Devine @cherylofficial…'.
Coming soon? The 33-year-old pop star may have disrobed for a special baby bump shoot with fashion photographer Mariano Vivanco - reminiscent of Demi Moore's famous 1991 Vanity Fair cover, taken while she was seven months pregnant
Apparently excited about his project, he also took to his social media account to announce in a video: 'I’m shooting someone very special today.'
However, it seems that he may have spoken out of turn, as the image and announcement were soon erased from his account with no explanation.
Cheryl and Liam first met in 2008 when he was an aspiring teenage contestant on The X Factor and she was a judge.
Boyish: Baby-faced Liam was 14 when he first auditioned for The X Factor but he returned as a solo artist in 2010
Baby-faced Liam was 14 when he first auditioned for the show but he returned as a solo artist in 2010 only to be partnered with Niall Horan, Harry Styles, Zayn Malik and Louis Tomlinson, who went on to become global boyband One Direction.
They went public with their romance in February, just weeks after Cheryl announced her split from second husband Jean-Bernard Fernandez-Versini after 18 months of marriage.
But the genetically-blessed twosome are said to have started dating in secret as early as December 2015.
First love: The singer l has had a rocky road to true love; she was married to former Arsenal, Chelsea and England footballer Ashley Cole for four years, but the pair split following allegations of his infidelity
Cheryl first showed off her bump before Christmas when she attended the Fayre of St. James Christmas Concert in London in November.
She has refused to comment publicly on the pregnancy, but is said to be 'ecstatic' about starting a family.
The singer l has had a rocky road to true love; she was married to former Arsenal, Chelsea and England footballer Ashley Cole for four years, but the pair split following allegations of his infidelity.
Previously: Cheryl later wed French restaurateur Jean-Bernard in 2014 following a whirlwind three months of dating, only to announce their separation at the end of 2015
She later wed French restaurateur Jean-Bernard in 2014 following a whirlwind three months of dating, only to announce their separation at the end of 2015.
The former Girls Aloud star was handed a decree nisi ending her marriage to the Frenchman at the Central Family Court in London last October.
In papers filed at the court the singer cited his ‘unreasonable behaviour’ as the reason for divorce, claiming it had caused her ‘stress and weight loss’.
